name: Nas Education Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a production studio intended to create impactful stories for social media. The company's site shares a list of trending blogs, one-minute videos, journals, and articles on life, culture, travel, and food and also offers a content creation platform, providing viewers with various stories from the world and empowering creators to become educators.
one_liner: Operator of a production studio intended to create impactful stories for social media. The company's site shares a list of trending blogs, one-minute videos, journals, and articles on life, culture, travel, and food and also offers a content creation platform, providing viewers with various stories from the world and empowering creators to become educators.
